sourcesContent:
import React from "react" export default function Article() { const articleContent=[{imgSrc:"hospimain",description:<>SELECT Tables, MAX(SnapshotDate) AS SnapshotDate FROM OPENROWSET(BULK 'Custom/QBU/SnapshotLogs', DATA_SOURCE = 'FDnE_ADLS_MSSales_PROD', FORMAT = 'DELTA') WITH (Tables VARCHAR(1000), CompletedTime VARCHAR(100), Note VARCHAR(MAX), SnapshotDate VARCHAR(1000)) AS ROWS WHERE Tables IN ( 'FACT_AzureConsumedRevenue' ,'FACT_ACRForecast' ,'FACT_ACRTargets' ,'FACT_SFI' ,'FACT_SellIn' ,'FACT_SellThru' ,'FACT_Forecast' ,'FACT_Budget' ,'FACT_MCAPS_FieldForecastACR' ,'FACT_MCAPS_FieldForecastBR' ,'FACT_RevenueOutlook' ,'FACT_MicrosoftAzureCommitToConsume') GROUP BY Tables ORDER BY SnapshotDate,title:"BHMS Homeopathy Expert",name:"Dr. Harshit Shakya"}] const renderCard=(content)=>{ return(

{content.name}

{content.title}

{content.description}

) } return (
{articleContent.map((content,index)=>(renderCard(content)))}
) }
